description: onPlanet (OP) is a social and financial (SoFi) platform which allows teams, content creators and influencers of any kind to build a brand, gather a following, offer customized content subscription services, and crowdsource a project all in one space. Hyper-deflationary %10/%10 fee Features: Antibot, AntiWhale, MaxTransaction, and Platform-based Hyper-burns. KYC by PinkSale & FLooz Audited by Certik
